revision.text: {{also|xin}} ==English== ===Etymology=== From several Chinese surnames, including {{bor|en|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|辛|Xīn}}, {{zh-l|信|Xìn}}, {{zh-l|新|Xīn}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Xins}} # {{surname|en}}. ===Statistics=== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Xin'' is the 25924<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 948 individuals. ''Xin'' is most common among Asian/Pacific Islander (96.73%) individuals. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=inx|:*nix|Nix|nix}}
